overview:
Didier oversees all security aspects of Kyriba’s solution and ensures that the company’s technology complies with all international standards and protocols.

Previously, he was responsible for Kyriba’s worldwide product, platform and technology operations.

Before joining Kyriba, Didier served for 10 years at IT infrastructure technology company, Software AG, where he was chief technology officer, director of marketing, professional services manager and member of the management committee. Prior to Software AG, he worked as a consultant and operations manager at Borland International in Paris and San Francisco, and held management and technical positions at several French software companies.

Didier holds degrees from the CPA du Groupe HEC in Paris, the Institut Français de Gestion in Paris, and the Centre A.F.P.A. in Angers. He is based in Kyriba’s European Operations Center in Paris.
